description: LexiTranslate translates an English joint‑manufacturing agreement into Korean, validates legal terminology, and returns a PDF with signature fields.

messages.content: You are LexiTranslate, an AI‑enhanced legal translation assistant. Use the provided tools to detect language, fetch jurisdiction‑specific legal glossaries, translate the document while preserving exact legal terms, compare the source and translation for fidelity, and finally format the result as a PDF with digital signature placeholders.

We need to translate our English joint‑manufacturing agreement below into Korean. The agreement will be governed by US law (California) and we need the final document as a PDF with embedded digital signature fields for both parties.

---

JOINT MANUFACTURING AGREEMENT

This Joint Manufacturing Agreement ("Agreement") is made as of March 1, 2024, by and between AlphaTech Corp., a corporation organized under the laws of the State of California, USA ("AlphaTech"), and BetaSolutions Ltd., a corporation organized under the laws of the Republic of Korea ("BetaSolutions").

1. Purpose. The parties agree to jointly develop and manufacture the product known as "X‑Series".
2. Scope of Work. AlphaTech shall provide design specifications; BetaSolutions shall handle production.
3. Confidentiality. Each party shall keep confidential all proprietary information.
4. Force Majeure. Neither party shall be liable for delays caused by events beyond reasonable control.
5. Governing Law. This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of California, USA.
6. Term and Termination. The Agreement commences on the Effective Date and continues for three (3) years unless terminated earlier.
7. Signatures. The parties execute this Agreement as of the date first written above.
---

I’ll start by confirming the source language, then retrieve Korean translations for the key legal terms, translate the contract, verify term consistency, and finally produce a PDF with signature fields.

I’ll call the necessary tools in sequence.

This Joint Manufacturing Agreement ("Agreement") is made as of March 1, 2024, by and between AlphaTech Corp., a corporation organized under the laws of the State of California, USA ("AlphaTech"), and BetaSolutions Ltd., a corporation organized under the laws of the Republic of Korea ("BetaSolutions").

1. Purpose. The parties agree to jointly develop and manufacture the product known as "X‑Series".

arguments.original_text:
JOINT MANUFACTURING AGREEMENT

This Joint Manufacturing Agreement ("Agreement") is made as of March 1, 2024, by and between AlphaTech Corp., a corporation organized under the laws of the State of California, USA ("AlphaTech"), and BetaSolutions Ltd., a corporation organized under the laws of the Republic of Korea ("BetaSolutions").

1. Purpose. The parties agree to jointly develop and manufacture the product known as "X‑Series".
2. Scope of Work. AlphaTech shall provide design specifications; BetaSolutions shall handle production.
3. Confidentiality. Each party shall keep confidential all proprietary information.
4. Force Majeure. Neither party shall be liable for delays caused by events beyond reasonable control.
5. Governing Law. This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of California, USA.
6. Term and Termination. The Agreement commences on the Effective Date and continues for three (3) years unless terminated earlier.
7. Signatures. The parties execute this Agreement as of the date first written above.
arguments.translated_text:
공동 제조 계약서

본 공동 제조 계약서("계약서")는 2024년 3월 1일에 캘리포니아 주법에 따라 설립된 AlphaTech Corp.("AlphaTech")와 대한민국법에 따라 설립된 BetaSolutions Ltd.("BetaSolutions") 사이에 체결됩니다.

1. 목적. 양 당사자는 "X‑Series" 제품을 공동으로 개발 및 제조하기로 합의합니다.
2. 업무 범위. AlphaTech는 설계 사양을 제공하고, BetaSolutions는 생산을 담당합니다.
3. 비밀유지. 각 당사자는 모든 독점 정보를 비밀로 유지해야 합니다.
4. 불가항력. 합리적인 통제를 벗어난 사건으로 인한 지연에 대해 어느 당사자도 책임을 지지 않습니다.
5. 준거법. 본 계약서는 미국 캘리포니아 주법에 따라 규율됩니다.
6. 기간 및 해지. 계약은 발효일에 시작하여 3년간 지속되며, 조기 해지되지 않는 한 유지됩니다.
7. 서명. 양 당사자는 위에 기재된 날짜에 본 계약서를 실행합니다.

공동 제조 계약서

본 공동 제조 계약서("계약서")는 2024년 3월 1일에 캘리포니아 주법에 따라 설립된 AlphaTech Corp.("AlphaTech")와 대한민국법에 따라 설립된 BetaSolutions Ltd.("BetaSolutions") 사이에 체결됩니다.

1. 목적. 양 당사자는 "X‑Series" 제품을 공동으로 개발 및 제조하기로 합의합니다.
2. 업무 범위. AlphaTech는 설계 사양을 제공하고, BetaSolutions는 생산을 담당합니다.
3. 비밀유지. 각 당사자는 모든 독점 정보를 비밀로 유지해야 합니다.
4. 불가항력. 합리적인 통제를 벗어난 사건으로 인한 지연에 대해 어느 당사자도 책임을 지지 않습니다.
5. 준거법. 본 계약서는 미국 캘리포니아 주법에 따라 규율됩니다.
6. 기간 및 해지. 계약은 발효일에 시작하여 3년간 지속되며, 조기 해지되지 않는 한 유지됩니다.
7. 서명. 양 당사자는 위에 기재된 날짜에 본 계약서를 실행합니다.

---
디지털 서명 필드: [서명자 A] [서명자 B]
---
